action.name: Kinetic Shot
action.upeffect: The Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and the distance pushed back increases by 1 per level.

action.name: Kinetic Blast
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and at level 5 the arc increases to 60$^{\circ}$.

action.name: Forceful Blade
action.effect: For the next 50 Time Units when your Character hits with a Melee Weapon Attack the Target Character suffers a -1 to the Saving Throw
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level, the duration increases by 50 Time Units per level and the modifier is decreased by 1 per level.

action.name: Forceful Shot
action.effect: For the next 50 Time Units when your Character hits with a Ranged Weapon Attack using a Ballistic or Rail weapon the Target Character suffers a -1 to the Saving Throw
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level, the duration increases by 50 Time Units per level and the modifier is decreased by 1 per 2 levels.

action.name: Kinetic Jump
action.effect: Jump over things from a minimum of 50m to a maximum of 100m.
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level, the Time Cost is at -1 per level and the maximum distance increases at 10m per level

action.name: Light Shot
action.effect: Target Character within 200m must make a Physical Save or take 1 damage.
action.upeffect: The Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and range is at +5 per level.

action.name: Light Blast
action.effect: All Characters in a 75m line must make a Physical Save or take 1 damage.
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and range is at +5 per level.

action.name: Blinding Light
action.effect: Target Character within 150m must make a Mental Saving Throw or suffer a -5 to all Difficulty Count Rolls for the next 100 Time Units
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and duration is increased by 10 Time Units.

action.name: Eletric Shot
action.effect: Target Character within 100m must make a Physical Save or have to wait 5 Time Units and take 1 damage.
action.upeffect: The Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and Time Units waited increases by +1 per level.

action.name: Eletric Arc
action.effect: Target Character within 75m must make a Physical Save or take 1 damage. Each time a Character takes damage from this Action the nearest Character that has not been effected by it must make a Physical Save or take 1 damage
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level.

action.name: Rail Shot
action.effect: Modifies Shoot Ranged Weapon Action Range by +25m of a Ballistic Weapon.
action.upeffect: -1 per level to the Time Modifier up to five levels and increases range by 5m per level.

action.name: Lightning Throwing
action.effect: For 50 Time Units a spear of lightning Appears in your Character's hand which has Difficulty Count 15, Time 10, Range 100, Damage 1.
action.upeffect: Difficult Count of this Action is at -1 per level, the duration increases by 50 Time Units and the range of the spear of lightning is at +10m per level.

action.name: Fire Shot
action.effect: Target Character within 50m must make a Physical Save or take 2 damage.
action.upeffect: The Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and every 5 levels damage increases by 1.

action.name: Fire Blast
action.effect: All Characters in a 10m radius circle at 75m must make a Physical Save or take 1 damage.
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and radius is at +1m per level.

action.name: Flame Grenade
action.effect: All Characters in a 5m radius circle at 50m must make a Physical Save or take 1 damage, ignores Cover.
action.upeffect: Difficulty Count is at -1 per level and radius is at +1m per level.

action.name: Flame Blade
action.effect: For 50 Time Units a blade of fire Appears in your Character's hand which has Difficulty Count 15, Time 15, Range 1, Damage 2 and is always a Melee Weapon.
action.upeffect: Difficult Count of this Action is at -1 per level, the duration increases by 50 Time Units and the range of the blade of fire is at +1m per level.
